response_requirements.initial_response_description: Public body must respond within 5 working days of receipt (day after request received is day one)
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If impossible to respond in 5 days, may extend 7 additional working days with written explanation (total 12 working days maximum)
response_requirements.extension_notes: Must explain conditions making 5-day response impossible; requests after 5 PM considered received next working day

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: May charge reasonable fees for search, retrieval, and copying

exemptions.description: Personnel records including employment applications, performance evaluations, and disciplinary records
Attorney-client privileged communications and attorney work product
Criminal investigative files and law enforcement records
Personal contact information and identifying details

appeal_process.first_level: Circuit Court or General District Court
appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal; direct petition to circuit court or general district court
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court may award reasonable costs and attorney fees to prevailing petitioner

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: May be oral or written (written recommended); must adequately identify desired records
requester_requirements.specific_format: No specific format required; submit to custodian of records

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Custodian of records designated for each public body
agency_obligations.response_format_options: Must make reasonable efforts to reach agreement with requester
agency_obligations.liberal_construction: Liberally construed to promote awareness of governmental activities; exemptions narrowly construed
agency_obligations.burden_of_proof: Burden on public body to justify denial

oversight_body.name: Virginia Freedom of Information Advisory Council
oversight_body.role: Provides guidance, training, and dispute resolution assistance

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Virginia statute. 5 working day response with 7 day extension possible (12 day maximum). May charge for search and copying. No administrative appeal - direct court review. Attorney fees to prevailing petitioner. Liberal construction favoring access, narrow construction of exemptions. Strong presumption of openness. FOIA Advisory Council provides guidance.
